data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Mandoul, Chad.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mandoul, Chad
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, 637,100 people live in the state of Mandoul. Please, give them 127 new simple churches this year.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 637,100 people living in Mandoul through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 46,373 believers living in Mandoul, Chad.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Birgid people.
Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Mandoul, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 46,373 believers in Mandoul, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mandoul, Chad has a population of 637,100.

We estimate Mandoul has 46,373 people who might know Jesus, 116,323 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 474,404 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 46,373 believers in Mandoul to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 590,727 lost friends and neighbors.
